org.resthub.tapestry5.security.services

Interface Authenticator

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SpringSecurityAuthenticator

    public interface Authenticator
    Basic security interface provinding access to informations about the loggued (or not) user
    Author:
    bmeurant , karesti
